amendment.description: Amendment requires NASA, whenever feasible, to choose abandoned and underutilized buildings, grounds, and facilities in depressed communities when selecting additional facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require NASA, whenever feasible, to chose abandoned and underutilized buildings, grounds, and facilities in depressed communities when selecting additional facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
